summary: Meditation app UI/UX polish and bug fixes across Dashboard, Pre-med, and Meditation pages.
known_issues: Pre-med page shows duplicate volume controls in the same container.
Dashboard carousel navigation refreshes/changes quote unexpectedly.
Dashboard and Pre-med UI elements (buttons, etc.) are oversized.
Dashboard shows incorrect/extra controls ('Begin Session' label and 'Take Quiz' button).
Pre-med 'Save as ritual' appears before meditation completion.
Meditation timer glow/progress style does not match desired circular fill behavior.

existing_features.title: On the Pre‑Meditation page, remove the duplicate volume input element from the selected container (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]) so that only a single volume control remains in that container and there are no two volume inputs that control the same audio volume.

new_feature_requests.summary: Pre-med page: remove duplicate volume input element so only one volume control exists in the container.
Dashboard carousel: navigating the carousel should not refresh/change the displayed quote; quote should only change on full page refresh or revisit.
Reduce overall button/control sizing, especially on Dashboard and Pre-med pages.
Dashboard: change 'Begin Session' label to 'Begin' and remove the 'Take Quiz' button; if quiz is selected, clicking Begin should start the quiz flow.
Pre-med page: hide/remove 'Save as ritual' button until after meditation has finished.
Meditation page: replace timer with circular fill progress that fills as time approaches 0; filled portion should have a slight glow (not a large glow over the whole timer).

projectName: Remove duplicate volume input in Pre‑Meditation setup container
